refnamediv.refpurpose: concatenate and print files in reverse

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Write each FILE to standard output, last line first. With no FILE, or when FILE is -, read standard input.
Mandatory arguments to long options are mandatory for short options too.

listitem.para: attach the separator before instead of after
interpret the separator as a regular expression
use STRING as the separator instead of newline
GNU coreutils online help: <http://www.gnu.org/software/coreutils/> Report tac translation bugs to <http://translationproject.org/team/>

refsect1.title: SEE ALSO
refsect1.para: The full documentation for tac is maintained as a Texinfo manual. If the info and tac programs are properly installed at your site, the command
should give you access to the complete manual.
